translation.en: Gather your strength, you lot! Put your backs into it!
translation.ja: 〈みんなで力を合わせて 運ぶんだ〉

translation.en: Move it straight away!
translation.ja: 〈まっすぐ行け〉

translation.en: Come on, lift! Lift, boy, lift!
translation.ja: 〈よし 持ち上げろ〉

translation.en: Easy, easy!
translation.ja: 〈ゆっくりな〉

translation.en: [Osama] With them, Ashraf!
translation.ja: 〈ついていけ〉

translation.en: [Ahmed, in English] This is all… For me and for all Saqqara, it's unique.
translation.ja: これは私の経験上 珍しいことだ

translation.en: Some missions working for one, two or three months, and nothing found.
translation.ja: ３ヵ月かけても 何も見つからないこともある

translation.en: And here, as you see today, every 30 seconds, we found something new.
translation.ja: でも今日は30秒ごとに 新しいものが見つかった

translation.en: So, in all this one year, complete one year from April to April,
translation.ja: もしも１年中 こんな状態だったら―

translation.en: we have three storerooms complete,
translation.ja: 倉庫３つが埋まる

translation.en: full of masterpieces, and that one in the lab, with Dr. Ashraf,
translation.ja: またアシュラフ博士の 研究所も―

translation.en: will have also many boxes full of masterpieces.
translation.ja: 副葬品で埋め尽くされる

translation.en: All of these things found here at Saqqara, in our site.
translation.ja: これらは全てサッカラで 発掘された

translation.en: -[Hamada] Dr. Mohammad? -[Mohammad] Yes?
translation.ja: 〈ムハンマド博士〉 〈何だ〉

translation.en: -[Osama] There are bones here. -[Mohammad speaks Arabic]
translation.ja: 〈骨がある〉

translation.en: -[Mohammad] What's that? -[Osama] A skull.
translation.ja: 〈それは？〉 〈頭蓋骨だ〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] Is it just a skull on its own? Not part of a burial or anything?
translation.ja: 〈頭蓋骨だけが 単独であるのか？〉

translation.en: All right, look, Osama. Grab that!
translation.ja: 〈よし ウサマ 交代しよう〉

translation.en: Look out, Osama.
translation.ja: 〈押さえてろ〉

translation.en: There's a head…
translation.ja: 〈確かに頭部だ〉

translation.en: -[Osama] A skull? -[Mohammad] Yeah.
translation.ja: 〈頭蓋骨だね〉

translation.en: -All the bones are piled in this corner. -[Osama] Hmm. Hmm.
translation.ja: 〈隅に骨が積み上げてある〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] I think it's more than one person.
translation.ja: 〈多分 複数の人の骨だ〉

translation.en: [Mohammad, in English] This shaft is strange for us.
translation.ja: この竪穴は奇妙だ

translation.en: We didn't find a burial chamber in this shaft.
translation.ja: 埋葬室のようなものはなく―

translation.en: It's just two meters and stop.
translation.ja: ２メートル掘られただけ

translation.en: [Mohammad] But we find the remains of two skeletons.
translation.ja: ２人分の骨が見つかった

translation.en: It looks like it's standing because the bones go…
translation.ja: 立っていたようで 頭部から順に―

translation.en: uh… uh, from top to bottom.
translation.ja: 重なってた

translation.en: There are things that are turned over, but they're small as well.
translation.ja: 転がってる部分もあるし 全体的に小さい

translation.en: [Mohammad] Why these people buried this way?
translation.ja: なぜ こんな形で埋葬を？

translation.en: Why they didn't make a coffin for each one?
translation.ja: なぜ棺を作らなかったのか？

translation.en: I think they are buried quickly in this shaft.
translation.ja: 私は彼らが急いで 埋葬されたのだと思う

translation.en: [in Arabic] I mean, it's been crammed in here.
translation.ja: 〈２人では この穴は狭い〉

translation.en: [in English] Could be something happened to the family of Wahtye.
translation.ja: ワフティーの家族に 何が起こったのか

translation.en: [in English] So, on the glabella…
translation.ja: 眉間の辺りが―

translation.en: it is smooth, it's not that… prominent,
translation.ja: 滑らかで それほど突き出していない

translation.en: so she is a female.
translation.ja: 彼女は女性ね

translation.en: Most probably a nice lady.
translation.ja: 淑女だったはず

translation.en: Still, we don't know her age.
translation.ja: 年齢は まだ不明よ

translation.en: The middle shaft was another bag with totally destroyed bones,
translation.ja: 竪穴３でも― バラバラになった骨が 見つかった

translation.en: totally covered by mud.
translation.ja: 泥に覆われてね

translation.en: It's very fragile.
translation.ja: 非常に もろい

translation.en: This mandible is pushed to the front.
translation.ja: 下アゴが前に押し出されてる

translation.en: I think because the effect of the mud.
translation.ja: 泥の影響だと思うわ

translation.en: Still, we need to clean the teeth in order to see her age.
translation.ja: 歯をキレイにして 年齢を割り出す

translation.en: I found the skull of an old woman,
translation.ja: あれは中高年の女性だった

translation.en: more than 55.
translation.ja: 年齢は55歳以上

translation.en: So I'm trying to see something about how… how did this woman die.
translation.ja: この女性が― どうして亡くなったのか 調べてるの

translation.en: The old woman had, uh…
translation.ja: 中高年の女性は 下アゴの内側に―

translation.en: some swelling here in the mandible,
translation.ja: 中高年の女性は 下アゴの内側に― 腫れがあったようね

translation.en: in the inner side of the mandible.
translation.ja: 腫れがあったようね

translation.en: The bone was distended, uh, from inside with a cystic-like swelling.
translation.ja: のう胞のような腫れで 骨が内側から膨張してた

translation.en: I think I removed most of the mud.
translation.ja: 泥は大体 落ちたと思う

translation.en: We are lucky to find it because the bone was in a terrible situation.
translation.ja: 保存状態が ひどく 腫れが分かったのは幸運ね

translation.en: It's not here.
translation.ja: 以上ね

translation.en: This is another person.
translation.ja: これは別の人

translation.en: They are not one.
translation.ja: 全く違うわ

translation.en: Young, very young.
translation.ja: すごく若い

translation.en: Small person.
translation.ja: 体が小さい

translation.en: No, this is the right temple.
translation.ja: 右の こめかみね

translation.en: I think we have three here.
translation.ja: ３人いたみたい

translation.en: And I think this is a mandible of…
translation.ja: この下アゴは…

translation.en: an adult woman, I think.
translation.ja: 大人の女性ね

translation.en: This hole have two women and one child.
translation.ja: この穴には 女性２人と子供１人

translation.en: Old woman, younger woman, and a child, I think so.
translation.ja: 中高年の女性 若い女性 そして子供ね

translation.en: [Mohammad] So, in shaft number three?
translation.ja: 〈竪穴３は？〉

translation.en: -Two women. -Two women.
translation.ja: 〈女性が２人〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] About how old?
translation.ja: 〈年齢は？〉

translation.en: [Amira] One is over 50.
translation.ja: 〈１人は50歳以上〉

translation.en: Probably his mother then.
translation.ja: 〈墓の主の母親か〉

translation.en: [Amira] And the other one,
translation.ja: 〈もう１人は―〉

translation.en: you can say she was in her thirties from the wear on the teeth.
translation.ja: 〈歯のすり減り具合から 推定30代〉

translation.en: It might be the wife.
translation.ja: 〈奥さんかもな〉

translation.en: -[man speaking Arabic] -[Mohammad] All right, Doctor.
translation.ja: 〈ありがとう〉

translation.en: Anything else with them?
translation.ja: 〈他に何か？〉

translation.en: [Amira] Yes, a child's bones.
translation.ja: 〈子供の骨は―〉

translation.en: The age isn't very clear.
translation.ja: 〈年齢不詳ね〉

translation.en: -Bones of child, age unknown. -[Amira speaking Arabic]
translation.ja: 〈“子供の骨　年齢不詳”〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] Really, a fourth child?
translation.ja: 〈４人目の子供かな〉

translation.en: [Amira] Maybe so.
translation.ja: 〈多分ね〉

translation.en: Ahmed, we have four children.
translation.ja: 〈４人目も発見か〉

translation.en: -Are there four on the walls? -Yes, there are four.
translation.ja: 〈レリーフに？〉 〈４人 描かれてる〉

translation.en: Three boys and a girl.
translation.ja: 〈少年３人と少女１人〉

translation.en: The three boys might have been in that shaft, and here, the two ladies with the girl.
translation.ja: 〈竪穴１に３人の少年 竪穴３に女性２人と少女ね〉

translation.en: [Ahmed] They buried the females together?
translation.ja: 〈女性たちを同じ穴に？〉

translation.en: The girl with the mother and the wife.
translation.ja: 〈少女と母親と妻かな〉

translation.en: [Amira] It's a good theory.
translation.ja: 〈ありえるわね〉

translation.en: [Amira] This is his family lying beside each other.
translation.ja: 墓の主の家族が並んで寝てる

translation.en: [Amira, in English] From their ages and the situation of the bones, we must have strong suspicions
translation.ja: 年齢と骨の状態から この家族１人１人の死が―

translation.en: that the deaths of all these people were connected somehow.
translation.ja: 深く結びついていると 考えずにはいられない

translation.en: [Ahmed, in English] Wahtye's life, it was very complicated.
translation.ja: ワフティーの人生は複雑だ

translation.en: What happened for his family?
translation.ja: 彼の家族に何が？

translation.en: [in English] Died at the same time? Or one by one?
translation.ja: 同時に死んだのか？ １人１人か？

translation.en: [in English] Why they died so early like this?
translation.ja: なぜ若くして 亡くなったのか？

translation.en: I can't imagine myself.
translation.ja: 自分だったら？

translation.en: I'm so lucky. I have three daughters and one son.
translation.ja: 幸運にも私には３人の娘と １人の息子がいる

translation.en: Rawda, the smallest one…
translation.ja: 末っ子のラウダは―

translation.en: Four years. I love her so much.
translation.ja: ４歳だ　とても愛してる

translation.en: [in English] I think if I lost my son or daughters…
translation.ja: もし私が子供を亡くしたら…

translation.en: I put myself instead of him…
translation.ja: 我が身に置き換えると―

translation.en: I can't believe.
translation.ja: 耐え難い

translation.en: [in English] It's very, very sad.
translation.ja: すごく悲しい

translation.en: To lose the whole family? It's terrible.
translation.ja: 家族全員亡くすなんて最悪だ

translation.en: [Ahmed, in English] I think there's some tragedy in the last part of life of Wahtye.
translation.ja: ワフティーの人生の終盤に 何らかの悲劇が起こった

translation.en: But how? We don't know at this time.
translation.ja: 何が起きたかは まだ分からない

translation.en: So we still have puzzle.
translation.ja: まだ謎のままだ

translation.en: We need to find Wahtye to work this out.
translation.ja: ワフティーを見つけなければ

translation.en: And there's only one place left to look.
translation.ja: 探すべき所は１つだ

translation.en: -Put your back into it! -[Ghareeb] Yes, Doctor!
translation.ja: 〈全力で掘れ〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] Whatever shaft you go into, you jinx it!
translation.ja: 〈穴を悪運を呼び込むなよ〉

translation.en: You should read some of the Qur'an in the morning!
translation.ja: 〈朝 ちゃんと コーランを読め〉

translation.en: [Ghareeb] I did, Doctor!
translation.ja: 〈読んだよ〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] Ghareeb, I like you, but you're jinxing the whole thing!
translation.ja: 〈本当か ガリーブ 悪運を呼んでるぞ〉

translation.en: [Ghareeb] No, Doctor! I don't know what to say.
translation.ja: 〈冗談はよしてくれ 博士〉

translation.en: -If you'd taken more care of your men… -[Ghareeb] Take more care than this?
translation.ja: 〈部下たちを大事に してないんじゃないか？〉

translation.en: -[Ghareeb] Should I buy them chocolates? -[man laughs]
translation.ja: 〈チョコでも買えと？〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] God will deal with you, Mustafa.
translation.ja: 〈判断は神に委ねよう〉

translation.en: Look, Mr. Sabry, the limestone is great.
translation.ja: 〈すばらしい石灰岩だ〉

translation.en: [Ahmed] This breakage is old. Broken from long ago. See?
translation.ja: 〈ずいぶん昔に 破損したようだ〉

translation.en: [Sabry] It's the upper part of a beautiful stone statue.
translation.ja: 〈上のほうは美しい〉

translation.en: -Yes, very beautiful. -[Sabry] And the wig is wonderful.
translation.ja: 〈ああ とても〉 〈カツラの部分がいい〉

translation.en: [Ahmed] The details are amazing.
translation.ja: 〈ディテールまでね〉

translation.en: -Mr. Ahmed. What's this beauty? -[Ahmed] Hey!
translation.ja: 〈アハメド〉 〈それは？〉

translation.en: I sent for you immediately.
translation.ja: 〈もうすぐだ〉

translation.en: You know the reliefs that we found a few days ago?
translation.ja: 〈数日前のレリーフを 覚えてる？〉

translation.en: -The King Rameses II ones? -Surely it's no coincidence?
translation.ja: 〈ラムセス２世の？〉 〈それと 関係してるのでは？〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] Yes. They're from a chapel above, I think.
translation.ja: 〈どちらも 上の礼拝所にあった〉

translation.en: [in English] So we found, three days ago, uh, very nice reliefs from the same…
translation.ja: とても美しいレリーフを ３日前に発掘した

translation.en: from the Ramesside time, with the cartouche of King Rameses II. It was very clear.
translation.ja: 新王国時代のもので ラムセス２世の名前が

translation.en: And today, we have this one, also the style of, uh, Ramesside.
translation.ja: 今日見つけた これも 新王国時代の様式だ

translation.en: That's many more than 3,300 years old.
translation.ja: つまり ３千３百年以上前の物だ

translation.en: Uh, the tomb of this man must be close to here.
translation.ja: この男性の墓は 近くにあるはずだ

translation.en: Maybe it's our part of, uh, the hill here, near, um, the wall over there.
translation.ja: この丘の こちら側に あると思われる

translation.en: [in Arabic] It's broken.
translation.ja: 〈ここで割れてる〉

translation.en: -I wonder, Ahmed… -[Ahmed] Hmm? Remember those two pieces of statue that we found?
translation.ja: 〈以前 像の破片を２つ 発掘したのを覚えてる？〉

translation.en: -In the first season? -Part in the first and part in second.
translation.ja: 〈第１次の時？〉 〈第１次と２次だ〉

translation.en: Do you think this might fit with them?
translation.ja: 〈あれとピッタリ合うかも〉

translation.en: Yeah, boss, I hope so.
translation.ja: 〈だといいな〉

translation.en: As-salamu alaykum.
translation.ja: 〈こんにちは〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] Look, Dr. Medhat. Remember the statue from last season?
translation.ja: 〈メドハット博士 前の調査で見つけた像を？〉

translation.en: -[Medhat] That was in several pieces? -In two pieces…
translation.ja: 〈割れていた像？〉 〈くっつけたよ〉

translation.en: -We've put them together! -[Mohammad] You have? Where is it?
translation.ja: 〈くっつけたよ〉 〈どこに置いたかな〉

translation.en: [Medhat] Come, have a look.
translation.ja: 〈どこに置いたかな〉

translation.en: God bless you! Can we check that piece?
translation.ja: 〈なるほど よく見てみてもいい？〉

translation.en: Bring it over, Mr. Ahmed.
translation.ja: 〈あれを持ってきて〉

translation.en: This is the part we found last May at the top of the site.
translation.ja: 〈この下の部分は去年５月に 丘の上で発掘した〉

translation.en: And this one, we found in October at the base of a shaft at the bottom.
translation.ja: 〈上は10月に 丘の下の竪穴の底で発見〉

translation.en: Give it to Dr. Ashraf.
translation.ja: 〈博士に渡して〉

translation.en: Look, look. Move back, move back.
translation.ja: 〈気をつけて もう少し後ろだ〉

translation.en: -[man speaks Arabic] -Lower. Give me a second.
translation.ja: 〈下ろして　確認する〉

translation.en: [Ashraf] No, go back up a bit.
translation.ja: 〈少し持ち上げて〉

translation.en: -Hold it! No, hold it! -Let go. Let go!
translation.ja: 〈止めて〉 〈手を離して〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] It's standing alone… Now support it!
translation.ja: 〈載ってるけど 押さえてて〉

translation.en: -[Ashraf] Perfect! Perfect! -[Mohammad laughing]
translation.ja: 〈完璧だ〉

translation.en: -All right. Perfect, perfect. -As soon as I saw it, I knew it would fit.
translation.ja: 〈やったね〉 〈絶対に合うと思った〉

translation.en: [Ashraf] Beautiful. Very beautiful.
translation.ja: 〈とても美しい〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] Thank God our brains are still working.
translation.ja: 〈まだ我々の勘は鋭い〉

translation.en: Nobody can imagine that this statue…
translation.ja: 誰も想像してなかった

translation.en: -[speaking Arabic] -[Ahmed] …three pieces, became complete statue.
translation.ja: あの３つの破片が １つになるとは

translation.en: So we are sure that we have something hidden below the sand.
translation.ja: 砂の中に必ず何かが 隠れてると確信した

translation.en: We need to search for the tomb of the owner of the statue.
translation.ja: あの像の持ち主の墓を 探さなきゃ

translation.en: I'm sure we can find it, inshallah, this season.
translation.ja: このシーズン中に 見つかるはず

translation.en: What do you have there? Move the debris to the south. Gentle.
translation.ja: 〈何があった？ 砂を南側に寄せろ〉

translation.en: -Easy, easy! -[Ahmed] Hold on, hold on.
translation.ja: 〈ゆっくりな〉 〈待って〉

translation.en: Mr. Hamada will come down now.
translation.ja: 〈ハマーダが下りる〉

translation.en: [Hamada] When we go down to the bottom of a shaft…
translation.ja: 〈竪穴を下りるのは怖かった〉

translation.en: particularly the shafts in Wahtye's tomb, we know that the rock is weak.
translation.ja: 〈ワフティーの墓の岩は 他と比べて もろくてね〉

translation.en: [Hamada] To me, this is the door to paradise.
translation.ja: 〈でも早く入りたかった〉

translation.en: I want to see him. I want to get closer to him.
translation.ja: 〈早く墓の主に 会いたかったからね〉

translation.en: [Hamada] I see an opening to the west in front of me.
translation.ja: 〈僕の前 西の方向に 空間がある〉

translation.en: The width of the opening is equal to the width of the shaft.
translation.ja: 〈空間の幅は竪穴と同じ〉

translation.en: -[Ahmed] About a meter? -[Hamada] Yeah.
translation.ja: 〈１メートル〉 〈同じだな〉

translation.en: [Ahmed] The entrance has widened.
translation.ja: 〈開口部は広がった？〉

translation.en: -[Hamada] Yes. -[Ahmed] Easier to see now?
translation.ja: 〈ああ〉 〈よく見えるか？ 何がある？〉

translation.en: -[Hamada] Yes. -[Ahmed] What can you see?
translation.ja: 〈よく見えるか？ 何がある？〉

translation.en: [Hamada] One second.
translation.ja: 〈待って〉

translation.en: I'll make sure before I get too excited.
translation.ja: 〈喜ぶ前に確認させてくれ〉

translation.en: -What? -[Hamada] Just give me a second.
translation.ja: 〈何だ？〉 〈待ってて〉

translation.en: It's Wahtye, manager!
translation.ja: 〈ワフティーだ〉

translation.en: Wahtye! We've found him!
translation.ja: 〈見つけたぞ〉

translation.en: Thank God! What have you got down there? Tell me!
translation.ja: 〈それは よかった 何がある？〉

translation.en: -A wooden coffin! -Finally we found Wahtye!
translation.ja: 〈木棺だ〉 〈ワフティーだ〉

translation.en: -[Ahmed] Great, great! -[Mohammad] Thank God!
translation.ja: 〈やったな〉 〈うれしい〉

translation.en: Congratulations, boss! A thousand congratulations, Hamada!
translation.ja: 〈本当におめでとう ハマーダ〉

translation.en: [sighs] This will be the first time he sees light.
translation.ja: 〈彼は初めて光に当たる〉

translation.en: You're lucky, Mr. Hamada.
translation.ja: 〈君は幸運だな〉

translation.en: Very lucky!
translation.ja: 〈すごく幸運だ〉

translation.en: You're the first person to see the burial from the chamber.
translation.ja: 〈君が初めて その棺を見るんだ〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] You're the first to see Wahtye.
translation.ja: 〈ワフティー本人もね〉

translation.en: -[Hamada] Dr. Mohammad! -[Mohammad] Yes, boss?
translation.ja: 〈ムハンマド博士〉 〈何だ？〉

translation.en: [Hamada] The skeleton of Wahtye is in here.
translation.ja: 〈ワフティーの骸骨だ〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] Great.
translation.ja: 〈よし〉

translation.en: -[Hamada] I've found the skull. -[Mohammad] Thank God.
translation.ja: 〈キレイにした〉 〈いいぞ〉

translation.en: -Mr. Hamada? -[Hamada] Yes?
translation.ja: 〈ハマーダ〉

translation.en: -[Ahmed] Are all the bones there? -[Hamada] Yes, all of them.
translation.ja: 〈骨は そろってる？〉 〈全部ある〉

translation.en: [Hamada] Thank God.
translation.ja: 〈感激だ〉

translation.en: It's so curious that in all the extravagance of this tomb,
translation.ja: 〈興味深いのは 墓は立派なのに―〉

translation.en: now that we've cleared the shafts,
translation.ja: 〈いざ竪穴を調べたら―〉

translation.en: -there are only two burial chambers. -[Mohammad] Hmm.
translation.ja: 〈２つしか埋葬室が なかったこと〉

translation.en: [Sabry] This main shaft has…
translation.ja: 〈メインの穴にも―〉

translation.en: a simple wooden coffin.
translation.ja: 〈シンプルな木棺のみ〉

translation.en: The story of this man still holds more riddles.
translation.ja: 〈まだ謎が多いね〉

translation.en: I think any father who loses his children is left with a scar inside them.
translation.ja: 〈子供を亡くした父親は 心に深い傷を負う〉

translation.en: But we felt his statues portray
translation.ja: 〈だが墓にあった彫像は―〉

translation.en: a sense of cheerfulness.
translation.ja: 〈どれも楽しげに見える〉

translation.en: So maybe the tomb was already finished before his children died.
translation.ja: 〈子供たちが亡くなる前に 既に墓は出来てたのかも〉

translation.en: Because the only place I sensed true sadness
translation.ja: 〈僕が本当に 悲しみを感じたのは―〉

translation.en: was in his burial chamber.
translation.ja: 〈ワフティーの 埋葬室だった〉

translation.en: There were no signs of luxury or indulgence.
translation.ja: 〈豪華さのかけらも なかった〉

translation.en: The coffin was just regular wood,
translation.ja: 〈棺は普通の木材で―〉

translation.en: and he wasn't even mummified that well.
translation.ja: 〈ミイラ化すら きちんとされていない〉

translation.en: Maybe the shock of his children's death brought him to this.
translation.ja: 〈子供の死の衝撃が その原因なのかも〉

translation.en: -Manager! -[Mohammad] Yes, boss!
translation.ja: 〈博士〉 〈何だ？〉

translation.en: The face of Wahtye! -[Mohammad] Yes? -[Hamada] Right in front of me.
translation.ja: 〈ワフティーの顔が 僕の目の前にある〉

translation.en: -Wahtye has finally made an appearance! -[Mohammad] Wonderful!
translation.ja: 〈ついに現れた〉 〈やったな〉

translation.en: [Hamada] In very good condition.
translation.ja: 〈保存状態もいい〉

translation.en: Thank God.
translation.ja: 〈よかった〉

translation.en: [Ahmed] We thought all would become clear when we found the burial chamber,
translation.ja: 〈埋葬室を見つけたら 謎が解けると思ったが―〉

translation.en: but there is more to discover.
translation.ja: 〈まだ探さないと〉

translation.en: We still need to find out how he died,
translation.ja: 〈死因は まだ 分からないけど―〉

translation.en: but it's something very beautiful which fills your heart with joy…
translation.ja: 〈あまりにも美しくて 心が喜びで満ちていった〉

translation.en: to reveal the face of Wahtye.
translation.ja: 〈顔が はっきり見えてね〉

translation.en: Breathe a sigh of relief
translation.ja: 〈ほっと息をついた〉

translation.en: and say, we've reached Wahtye.
translation.ja: 〈やっと見つけたから〉

translation.en: Here is the tomb and there's its owner.
translation.ja: 〈墓は主がいて―〉

translation.en: Now the picture is complete.
translation.ja: 〈ようやく完成する〉

translation.en: Has he arrived safely?
translation.ja: 〈無事 着いた？〉

translation.en: -[Mohammad] He's arrived. -Thank God!
translation.ja: 〈ああ〉 〈よかった〉

translation.en: [in English] The skeleton is, um… is, uh, kept better than the other one.
translation.ja: 他のものよりも 保存状態がいいわ

translation.en: And though he's a man, but still having some feminine features for his skull.
translation.ja: 男性だけど 頭蓋骨には 女性的な特徴もある

translation.en: He seems to be a very delicate man.
translation.ja: 繊細な人だったのね

translation.en: He's about 35 years old.
translation.ja: 年齢は35歳ぐらい

translation.en: I think this was Wahtye.
translation.ja: 多分ワフティーね

translation.en: At last, I met him. [chuckles]
translation.ja: やっと会えたわ

translation.en: He doesn't have that strong or rough muscle attachment,
translation.ja: 筋付着部が それほど 発達していないので―

translation.en: which may indicate that he was a fine man with a fine job.
translation.ja: 肉体を使う仕事では なかったようね

translation.en: Maybe because he's a master.
translation.ja: きっと彼は主として―

translation.en: He was the master of all these things.
translation.ja: 多くを所有してた

translation.en: The skull of Wahtye was showing, uh, thickening of the bone.
translation.ja: 頭蓋骨に肥厚が見られる

translation.en: We can lay him here.
translation.ja: ここに置きましょ

translation.en: And these can give us an idea
translation.ja: それは つまり―

translation.en: that there was something happening inside these bones.
translation.ja: 骨の内側で何かが 起こってたということ

translation.en: It's very interesting to be close to them
translation.ja: 彼らに近づいて―

translation.en: and to feel them as if I'm feeling his pains and…
translation.ja: 彼らの痛みや苦しみまで 感じたいと思う

translation.en: [inhales sharply] …and suffering. I'm trying to.
translation.ja: 彼らの痛みや苦しみまで 感じたいと思う 興味深いの

translation.en: It's not that easy, but I'm trying to feel that.
translation.ja: 理解するのは 簡単じゃないけどね

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: The shape of his lower limb bones are not that healthy
translation.ja: 下肢骨の形が あまり よくないわ

translation.en: because the knee is torted to inside.
translation.ja: ヒザが内側に ねじれてるの

translation.en: This should be like this, and this should be like this.
translation.ja: 本当はこうなってなければ いけない

translation.en: I think that, uh, angle should be externally rotated,
translation.ja: もっと外側を向いてなければ いけないんだけど―

translation.en: but in this man, instead of… of… of being this,
translation.ja: この人はヒザが こうなってなくて―

translation.en: no, he has it like this.
translation.ja: こうなってるの

translation.en: As if he was walking like this.
translation.ja: こう歩いてたのね

translation.en: I think he was, uh… weakened.
translation.ja: 弱ってたんだわ

translation.en: These bones weren't, uh, healthy.
translation.ja: 骨は健康的じゃなかった

translation.en: Maybe he suffered a lot of pains.
translation.ja: 痛みも多かったはず

translation.en: They were eager for blood…
translation.ja: 骨が血液を欲しがって―

translation.en: and that's why the bones are distended.
translation.ja: 膨らんでた

translation.en: Which can tell us… that this person may have some sort of anemia.
translation.ja: つまり何らかの貧血症を 抱えていたということ

translation.en: And the same swelling was found in the mom.
translation.ja: 彼の母親の骨にも 同じような膨らみが見られた

translation.en: We have congenital causes of anemia.
translation.ja: 先天性の貧血かも

translation.en: But, uh, this is, I think, a remote idea because both died in different age.
translation.ja: でも その可能性は低い 死んだ時の年齢が違いすぎる

translation.en: So it's not that common.
translation.ja: よくある病気でもないし

translation.en: But, uh, by putting the whole situation of that,
translation.ja: しかし何もかも 考え合わせてみると―

translation.en: we may think of some sort of, um, a disease…
translation.ja: 何らかの病気にかかったと 思われるわ

translation.en: or epidemic.
translation.ja: 伝染病とか

translation.en: Most probably malaria.
translation.ja: 最も可能性があるのは マラリア

translation.en: Which may affect this whole family.
translation.ja: 家族全員が かかったのかも

translation.en: And if that's true, that would change ancient Egyptian history.
translation.ja: 真実なら古代エジプトの 歴史が書き換えられる

translation.en: [Imam] Thank Allah.
translation.ja: 〈アラーに感謝を〉

translation.en: Thanks be to Allah alone…
translation.ja: 〈アラーのみに感謝を〉

translation.en: [Imam] God's mercy is for the merciful.
translation.ja: 〈神は慈悲深き者に慈悲を〉

translation.en: Be merciful to those who walk the earth.
translation.ja: 〈地上を歩く者に 慈悲深くあれ〉

translation.en: [Mohammad, in English] It is one of the, uh, rare examples,
translation.ja: 壁に描かれてた人物全員が―

translation.en: to find all the people who are depicted in the walls in the tomb
translation.ja: 埋葬されているのを 見つけるなんて―

translation.en: are buried in the shafts in the tomb.
translation.ja: 珍しいケースだと思う

translation.en: [Imam, in Arabic] And this worldly life is but play and folly…
translation.ja: 〈現世の生活は 遊びに過ぎず…〉

translation.en: [Mohammad, in English] We thank our God for this full story
translation.ja: この家族の物語に 触れられたことを―

translation.en: about this family.
translation.ja: 神に感謝する

translation.en: [in English] Wahtye is pleased of us,
translation.ja: ワフティーと我々は―

translation.en: and we are pleased of Wahtye.
translation.ja: 与え合ってる

translation.en: It is a communication. It's cooperation.
translation.ja: あれは交流であり 連携だ

translation.en: We made Wahtye famous after 4,500 years.
translation.ja: ４千５百年の時を越え 彼を有名にした

translation.en: So, if Wahtye comes now,
translation.ja: 今 ワフティーが現れたら―

translation.en: he thanks us because of what we did for him.
translation.ja: 我々がしたことに 感謝するだろう

translation.en: But we thank Wahtye, because without Wahtye,
translation.ja: 我々も彼がいなければ―

translation.en: our work would very quickly be forgotten.
translation.ja: こんなに関心を得ることは なかった

translation.en: [Amira, in English] We got the wrong idea.
translation.ja: 私たちは勘違いしていた

translation.en: These are their dreams. This is not the reality.
translation.ja: 壁に描かれたのは 思い出ではなく夢

translation.en: We felt that they put their photos on the walls.
translation.ja: 写真を壁に飾るのと 同じだと思ってた

translation.en: No, they don't have that belief.
translation.ja: そんな風習はない

translation.en: They are not like us.
translation.ja: 私たちはＳＮＳに 写真を上げるけど―

translation.en: We just take our photos on Facebook? Like no, this is not their Facebook.
translation.ja: 私たちはＳＮＳに 写真を上げるけど― これは全く違うの

translation.en: This is their dreams.
translation.ja: これは彼らの夢

translation.en: Because they believe in the other life much, much more than they believe in their first life.
translation.ja: 死後の世界は ずっといいものだと信じてた

translation.en: And that's why they made the dreams of the other life on the walls,
translation.ja: だから彼らは死後の世界への 希望を描いた

translation.en: and this is their first life.
translation.ja: これは現世の彼ら

translation.en: That's why you get a lot of mistakes about history.
translation.ja: 歴史について 誤解することは多い

translation.en: Seeing the great temples, the great statues,
translation.ja: 立派な神殿や 美しい彫像を見て―

translation.en: and you think everything in history was perfect.
translation.ja: 昔は完璧だったと思い込む

translation.en: And then, when you see the people, you discover they're like us.
translation.ja: でも個人単位で見れば 私たちと―

translation.en: Exactly like us.
translation.ja: 全く同じよ

translation.en: This is the real story.
translation.ja: これが現実なの

translation.en: [Ahmed, in English] After we finished Wahtye's tomb,
translation.ja: ワフティーの墓の作業後―

translation.en: all the team was very, very optimistic that we can find something
translation.ja: チームは また何か見つけて 来期も戻ってこられると―

translation.en: and we come back again next season.
translation.ja: 楽観的になってた

translation.en: But the head of the mission came to visit us…
translation.ja: だが この任務のトップが―

translation.en: [Ahmed] …and he gave us very bad news.
translation.ja: 悪い知らせを持ってきた

translation.en: [in English] We must finish this season after just two days.
translation.ja: ２日で発掘を終えろと

translation.en: [Ahmed] The government's budget finished.
translation.ja: 予算が尽きたらしい

translation.en: We need to complete our work.
translation.ja: 作業を急いだ

translation.en: [Ahmed] Remove everything…
translation.ja: 全てを移動

translation.en: [Ahmed] …because we must leave after two days.
translation.ja: ２日で撤収だったからね

translation.en: [in English] Usually, in the last week of the work,
translation.ja: 発掘任務の最後の週は―

translation.en: you try to secure the site and save it.
translation.ja: いつも現場の保存に努めてた

translation.en: [men, in Arabic] Ghareeb, help him.
translation.ja: 〈ガリーブ 手伝え〉

translation.en: Sometimes, you have a surprise.
translation.ja: でも驚きもある

translation.en: The cliff face looks good.
translation.ja: 〈ここに何かある〉

translation.en: [in English] Because, when you clean some place…
translation.ja: 片づけてると どこかで…

translation.en: [in Arabic] Get a mattock quick!
translation.ja: 〈つるはしを〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] …sometimes you discover something important.
translation.ja: 重要な物を見つけることも

translation.en: [in Arabic] Where are the empty buckets? Come on! Grab that one by your feet!
translation.ja: 〈空のバケツは？〉 〈そこにあるのを 持ってこい〉

translation.en: Come around this way, Doctor.
translation.ja: 〈博士 こっちへ〉

translation.en: [Mohammad] "To-Bi-Mis…"
translation.ja: 〈“ト… ビ… ミス”〉

translation.en: "To-Bi… Ben To-Bi-Mis."
translation.ja: 〈“ベン… ト… ビ… ミス”〉

translation.en: "Ben… Ben To-Bi-Mis."
translation.ja: 〈“ベン… ト… ビ… ミス”〉

translation.en: Look, "Judge," "The Great Judge."
translation.ja: 〈“偉大な裁判官”と 書かれてる〉

translation.en: [Hamada] The Bubasteion necropolis, I must say…
translation.ja: 〈ブバステイオン墓地は―〉

translation.en: [Hamada] …is a very strange place.
translation.ja: 〈不思議な場所だ〉

translation.en: [Hamada] It always gives us what we aren't expecting…
translation.ja: 〈常に予想外のものを 与えてくれる〉

translation.en: [Hamada] …and that's a wonderful thing.
translation.ja: 〈だから面白い〉
